JoinRequestDialog.title: Kɔka dan no ho .
JoinRequestDialog.inviteOnly: Eyi yɛ kokoam dan na ɛhwehwɛ sɛ wɔto nsa frɛ obi ansa na wabɛka ho .
JoinRequestDialog.knockRequired: Saa dan yi hwehwɛ sɛ wode akwammisa krataa kɔ. Klik button a ɛwɔ aseɛ ha no so na fa join request no mena .
JoinRequestDialog.canJoin: Eyi yɛ ɔmanfo dan, wubetumi akɔka ho tẽẽ .

JoinRequestList.noRequests: No joining request biara nni hɔ .

MessageList.noMessages: Nkra biara nni hɔ a, fa nkrasɛm a edi kan no mena na ama woafi nkɔmmɔbɔ no ase!
MessageList.historyEnd: Asɛm a edi kan koraa no aba .

MessageVirturalList.noMessages: Nkra biara nni hɔ a, fa nkrasɛm a edi kan no mena na ama woafi nkɔmmɔbɔ no ase!
